The overlap of Christian music with post rock becomes more apparent the more I listen to both. The melodic sounds, slow build ups, and explosive climax. This song has three of them. It's the best video on the internet. Period. Watch and immerse yourself for all 23 minutes and you'll see (and feel) why.
